text: Muminadera madhye yara aksama naya athaca ghare base thake o yara allahara pathe sbiya dhana-prana dbara jihada kare tara samana naya [1]. Yara sbiya dhana-prana dbara jihada kare allaha taderake, yara ghare base thake tadera upara maryada diyechena [2]; tadera pratyekera jan'ya allaha jannatera oyada karechena. Yara ghare base thake tadera upara yara jihada kare taderake allaha mahapuraskarera ksetre sresthatba diyechena
